bject: Re: Clash


  o--- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---o

  The missile his the =
ground behind Lokk, and he is thrown, into a 
  clump of trees. Bullets whi=
z into the trees around him. He frowns 
  thinking to himself, <<Seekker? P=
roabably>> and he waits lying on 
  the ground out of view. He starts to cr=
awl along, away from the 
  Chivitron base, trying to get behind the enemy.=


  The laser beams hit the pod Axis is hiding behind and disipate. He 
  q=
uickly brings his weapon over the pod, and fires a laser at 
  Barrymore. H=
e then arcs a missile over the pod at Barrymore's last 
  location. He is p=
elted by bullets and gaspes at Seekker, "What are 
  you doing!?! Get them,=
 not me!" He keeps hiding, not wanting to be 
  hurt. He was never known fo=
r his courage.

  Lynxiz slips three more disks into her launcher, looking =
for a new 
  target. Spotting another enemy who was attacking Termitron, sh=
e 
  sets up her disk launcher, and fires three disk at Stranato.

Jul 2001, at 17:37, Jordan Guthrie wrote:
